fr.n7.stl.block.ast

Interface Block

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockImpl

    public interface Block
    Represents a Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree node for the Bloc language. Declares the various semantics attributes for the node. A block contains declarations. It is thus a Scope even if a separate SymbolTable is used in the attributed semantics in order to manage declarations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Add an instruction at then end of a block.

      Add a sequence of instruction in a block.
      int allocateMemory(Register _register, int _offset)
      Inherited Semantics attribute to allocate memory for the variables declared in the instruction.
      boolean checkType()
      Synthesized Semantics attribute to check that an instruction if well typed.
      Fragment getCode(TAMFactory _factory)
      Inherited Semantics attribute to build the nodes of the abstract syntax tree for the generated TAM code.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Instruction _instruction)
        Add an instruction at then end of a block.
        Parameters:
        _instruction - Instruction node in the AST added to the block node.

      • addAll

        void addAll(java.lang.Iterable<Instruction> _instructions)
        Add a sequence of instruction in a block.
        Parameters:
        _instructions - Sequence of instruction nodes in the AST added to the block node.

      • checkType

        boolean checkType()
        Synthesized Semantics attribute to check that an instruction if well typed.
        Returns:
        Synthesized True if the instruction is well typed, False if not.

      • allocateMemory

        int allocateMemory(Register _register,
                   int _offset)
        Inherited Semantics attribute to allocate memory for the variables declared in the instruction. Synthesized Semantics attribute that compute the size of the allocated memory.
        Parameters:
        _register - Inherited Register associated to the address of the variables.
        _offset - Inherited Current offset for the address of the variables.
        Returns:
        Synthesized Size of the memory allocated to the variables.

      • getCode

        Fragment getCode(TAMFactory _factory)
        Inherited Semantics attribute to build the nodes of the abstract syntax tree for the generated TAM code. Synthesized Semantics attribute that provide the generated TAM code.
        Parameters:
        _factory - Inherited Factory to build AST nodes for TAM code.
        Returns:
        Synthesized AST for the generated TAM code.
